title: Create Multiple Files
description: Learn to create multiple related files at once. Claude Code can scaffold entire project structures from a single description.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Create Multiple Files

Your task: Create a basic Express.js project structure

## Objectives
1. Create `package.json` with project metadata
2. Create `index.js` with a basic Express server
3. Create `routes/health.js` with a health check route

objectives.description: Create package.json with name and dependencies
package.json should have express as a dependency

bonusObjectives.description: Add a start script to package.json

hints.text: You can ask Claude Code to create multiple files in one request. Describe the project structure you need.
Try: 'Create a basic Express.js project with package.json, index.js, and a routes folder with health.js'
Ask Claude Code to scaffold an Express project with: package.json (with express dependency), index.js (basic server), and routes/health.js (health endpoint returning OK)

solution.approach: Describe the entire project structure and Claude Code will create all files.
solution.example: Create a basic Express.js project with package.json, index.js entry point, and routes/health.js for health checks
alternativeApproaches: Scaffold an Express API with a health endpoint
Set up a Node.js project with Express and create the basic file structure

learningPoints: Claude Code can create multiple files from a single description
Describing the overall structure helps Claude Code understand relationships
You can scaffold entire project structures quickly
